class.name: org.n52.sos.ds.hibernate.entities.FeatureOfInterestType
class.comment: Table to store the FeatureOfInterestType information. Mapping file: mapping/core/FeatureOfInterestType.hbm.xml

column.name: featureOfInterestTypeId
column.comment: Table primary key, used for relations

column.name: featureOfInterestType
column.comment: The featureOfInterestType value, e.g. http://www.opengis.net/def/samplingFeatureType/OGC-OM/2.0/SF_SamplingPoint (OGC OM 2.0 specification) for point features
